result.text: Monkey King & the Belt & Road Initiative! What's the connection? Stay tuned for our next edition of Headline Buster with my personal take on the BRI's 10th anniversary. In Journey to the West, White Bone Demon was the Monkey King's nemesis, much like the West now, adamant about derailing the BRI. Debt trap, neo-colonialism, hegemonic ambition? Does the BRI have a Monkey King to watch its back? Share your thoughts below and my guests will react to your questions/comments during the show.
